__e: Were you aware that your father was worth a lot more dead than he was alive?
At first sight, there was no connection but I was certain that it was worth a lot more than it seemed at first glance.
If you didn't have what he wanted, you weren't much good to him.
When it came down to it, my life was more important to me than his.
I was the one who told you that... my love wasn't good enough... that your love was worth more than mine.
Why is a year with you is worth more than 37 with the woman who gave him a son?
I said I wasn't going to do this and I said that it wasn't worth it but it is.
This afternoon in the hospital... When you said that I was family, I realized that no money was worth losing that.
And I knew you were worth it, and I left something really good because I thought maybe it would be something really great.
I said I wasn't going to do this and I said that it wasn't worth it but it is.
This afternoon in the hospital... When you said that I was family, I realized that no money was worth losing that.
And I knew you were worth it, and I left something really good because I thought maybe it would be something really great.
I told you what to do to keep her here, but you didn't think the price was worth it.
Guess I just thought that when you said yes that... You were worth the risk.
Who was I to tell him the street wasn't worth the trouble ?
So I was in there, waitin' to die too, and I realized my life wasn't worth nothing.
Just when I thought my life was worth nothing, the Lord asked for it... told me he had a use for it and what was his plan for me.
So all this was because you didn't want your... wife to know you thought her horse was a dog?
That's all you were worth to him, and you know what?
A man like you would be a great resource to a woman like that.
